mapper.update: update category set category_name=#{category_name} , first_code=#{first_code} where category_code=#{category_code};
mapper.delete: update category set use_yn = 'n' where category_code = #{category_code};
update product set use_yn = 'n' where product_code = #{product_code};
mapper.update: update subcategory set subcategory_name=#{subcategory_name} , first_code=#{first_code} where subcategory_code=#{subcategory_code};
mapper.delete: update subcategory set use_yn = 'n' where subcategory_code = #{subcategory_code};
update options set use_yn = 'n' where option_code = #{option_code};
mapper.select: select store.*, user.name as manager_name from store left outer join user on store.manager = user.mid order by store_code desc;
mapper.insert: insert into stock (option_code, option_name, subcategory_code,store, quantity, use_yn, create_dt) (select option_code, option_name, subcategory_code,concat('STORE', '-',(select lpad(count(*)+1,3,'0') from store where store_code like 'STORE%' )), 0, 'y', now() from options where option_code like 'BREAD-%' AND use_yn = 'y')
mapper.select: select am.*, user.name, user.tel from ask_manager am inner join user user on am.mid = user.mid where am.pass_yn = 'w' order by ask_idx desc;
mapper.update: update ask_manager set pass_yn = #{pass_yn} where ask_idx=#{ask_idx};
mapper.select: select * from options where option_code = #{option_code} limit 1;
select user.*, level.level_name from user inner join level on user.level = level.level_code order by join_dt desc limit #{startNo}, #{pageSize}
